title: Spooked - The Fog
description: Blair can’t see his hands in front of his face. He can’t see the ground beneath his feet. He’s not in the dark: he’s in a thick cloud of fog. And then, a voice emerges from the mist. This story comes to us from Australia, the original Upside Down. Select Spooked episodes will be available across streaming platforms but ALL will be exclusively on Luminary. Download the Luminary mobile app or go to LuminaryPodcasts.com.
itunes:title: Spooked - The Fog
itunes:subtitle: Spooked - The Fog
author: paloma.orozco@prx.org (Snap Judgment and PRX)
